skins.name: Default
skins.secIdle1Text: Tsk! I'm so bored~ I wanna blow something up!
skins.secIdle2Text: My magazine's too easy to hit? It's fine, one day or another it'll blow up anyway!
skins.secIdle3Text: Oh, Commander, what do you think of the phrase, "I'm only half the person I used to be"? Sounds kinda philosophical, doesn't it?
skins.secTouchText: Ah, that's the spot, right there~

skins.name: Retrofit
skins.secIdle1Text: Shall we go light things up on the seas? Well, just when you're free, Commander. I'm not that bored yet~
